sourceOrganization.name: NIAID OCICB BCBB
sourceOrganization.abstract: The Office of Cyber Infrastructure and Computational Biology's (OCICB) Bioinformatics and Computational Biosciences Branch (BCBB) manages technologies supporting NIAID biomedical research programs.
sourceOrganization.description: The Bioinformatics and Computational Biosciences Branch (BCBB) collection provides innovative bioinformatics tools and resources that empower researchers globally. By integrating computational data-driven science and analysis, BCBB advances biomedical research to drive breakthroughs in treatments for infectious, immunologic, and allergic diseases.
alternateName: Office of Cyber Infrastructure and Computational Biology
OCICB Bioinformatics and Computational Biosciences Branch
